name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sentara ServiceNow IT - Something Broken Extension

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To be used with Sentara's nativeMessaging app to gather PC support data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is to be used on Sentara customer devices in order to autofill computer support related data into the "IT - Something Broken" support site.
